amendment.description: To extend the child tax credit until the year 2013.

vote.text: Amendment SA 430 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 106.

action.text: Amendment SA 430 proposed by Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S4411-4412; text: CR S4411) To extend the child tax credit until the year 2013.
